alluxio.client.file.options

Class MountOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.client.file.options.MountOptions

  • @PublicApi

public final class MountOptions
extends Object
    Method options for mounting a path.

      • isReadOnly

        public boolean isReadOnly()
        Returns:
        the value of the readonly flag; if true, no write or create operations are allowed under the mount point.

      • setReadOnly

      • isShared

        public boolean isShared()
        Returns:
        the value of the shared flag; if true, the mounted point is shared with all Alluxio users.

        Parameters:
